sun.security.action

Class GetPropertyAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • sun.security.action.GetPropertyAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.security.PrivilegedAction<java.lang.String>

    public class GetPropertyAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.security.PrivilegedAction<java.lang.String>
    A convenience class for retrieving the string value of a system property as a privileged action.

    An instance of this class can be used as the argument of AccessController.doPrivileged.

    The following code retrieves the value of the system property named "prop" as a privileged action: 

     String s = java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged
                      (new GetPropertyAction("prop"));
    Since:
    1.2
    See Also:
    PrivilegedAction, AccessController

        public java.lang.String run()

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.security.PrivilegedAction<java.lang.String>
